#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

void change(int num,int base)
{
int arr[10000],i=0;
while(num>0)
{
arr[i]=num%base;
num=num/base;
i++;
}
i--;
for(i;i>=0;i--)
printf("%d",arr[i]);
}

int main()
{
int t,num,base;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d %d",&num,&base);
if(num==0)
printf("0");
else
change(num,base);
printf("\n");
}
return 0;
}
